name: autokitteh
tagline: An event-driven automation framework for building programmable workflows
description: Autokitteh is an event-driven automation framework for building workflows using Python. It integrates with APIs and triggers actions via YAML definitions, ideal for self-hosting lightweight automation tasks.

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Automate workflows between services and internal systems

features.title: Event-Based Triggers
features.description: Trigger workflows from incoming events or webhooks

features.title: Service Integrations
features.description: Connect APIs, SaaS tools, and internal services

features.title: Workflow Monitoring
features.description: Monitor execution status and workflow results

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Build and manage workflows through a browser
